summary.span: 將所參考資料表中顯示的資料行指定為外部索引鍵資料行。

span.span: Specifies the column that is displayed in the referred table as a foreign-key column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當資料表中的資料行包含外部索引鍵時，動態資料就會推斷為參考資料表中該資料行的顯示值。When a column in a table contains a foreign key, Dynamic Data infers the display value for that column from the referenced table. 根據預設，會使用參考的資料表，其類型為字串 （或文字） 的第一個資料行。By default, the first column of the referenced table whose type is string (or text) is used. 屬性可讓您變更此預設行為，並指定不同的父資料表資料行作為外部索引鍵欄位的資料行。The attribute enables you to change this default behavior and to specify a different parent table column to use as the column for the foreign key field. 當您套用這個屬性時，您必須遵守下列使用條件約束：When you apply this attribute, you must adhere to the following usage constraints: - 屬性只能套用至類別。The attribute can only be applied to a class. - 由衍生類別可以繼承屬性。The attribute can be inherited by derived classes. - 屬性可以套用一次。The attribute can be applied only one time. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the attribute. 這個範例會執行下列工作：The example performs the following tasks: - 實作中繼資料的部分類別，位址 」 和 「 客戶 」 資料表，此為 CustomerAddress 資料表的父資料表。Implements metadata partial classes for the Address and Customer tables, which are parent tables for the CustomerAddress table. - 適用於屬性`Address`中繼資料的部分類別，來指定下列項目：Applies the attribute to the `Address` metadata partial class to specify the following: - City 資料行，從位址資料表 （父資料表） 會顯示為子資料表中的外部索引鍵資料行。The City column from the Address table (the parent table) is displayed as the foreign-key column in the CustomerAddress child table. - 位址資料表 （父資料表） 中的 [郵遞區號] 資料行用來排序子資料表中的 [位址] 選取範圍。The PostalCode column from the Address table (the parent table) is used for sorting the Address selection box in the CustomerAddress child table. - 在排序次序設定為遞增。The sort order is set to ascending. 此範例套用屬性`Customer`中繼資料的部分類別，以指定 LastName 資料行中的顯示為 CustomerAddress 資料表的外部索引鍵資料行。The example applies the attribute to the `Customer` metadata partial class to specify that the LastName column in displayed as the foreign-key column for the CustomerAddress table. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayColumnAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayColumnAttribute/CS/Address.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayColumnAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayColumnAttribute/VB/Address.vb#1)] 若要編譯此範例，您需要下列項目：To compile the example, you need the following: - 任何版本的 Visual Studio 2010 或更新版本。Any edition of Visual Studio 2010 or later. - 有提供 AdventureWorksLT 範例資料庫中。The AdventureWorksLT sample database. 如需如何下載並安裝 SQL Server 範例資料庫的資訊，請參閱[Microsoft SQL Server Product Samples: Database](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases) GitHub 上。For information about how to download and install the SQL Server sample database, see [Microsoft SQL Server Product Samples: Database](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases) on GitHub. 請確定您已安裝範例資料庫，您所執行的 SQL Server 版本的正確版本。Make sure that you install the correct version of the sample database for the version of SQL Server that you are running. - 動態資料導向網站。A dynamic data-driven Web site. 這可讓您建立資料庫的資料內容，並建立包含要自訂的資料欄位的類別。This enables you to create a data context for the database and to create the class that contains the data field to customize. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱`Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site using Scaffolding`。For more information, see `Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site using Scaffolding`.
